Class Events

java.lang.Object
com.lancaster.database.Events
public class Events extends Object
Represents an event in the Lancaster system. Contains details about event types, dates, rooms, and duration.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Events

      public Events(int eventId, String type, Date date, int room, int duration)
      Constructs an Event with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier for this event
      type - The type or category of the event
      date - The date and time when the event occurs
      room - The room number where the event takes place
      duration - The duration of the event in minutes
